name: dokan-migrator
description: An e-commerce marketplace migration plugin for WordPress.
author: WeDevs

scripts.setup: composer install && composer du -o && yarn install && echo üëç Composer And Node Packages Installation Done Successfully...
scripts.make:pot: wp i18n make-pot --domain='dokan-migrator' --exclude='node_modules,src,vendor' . --headers='{"Last-Translator":"support@wedevs.com","Report-Msgid-Bugs-To":"https://github.com/weDevsOfficial/dokan-migrator/issues"}' --file-comment="Copyright (c) $(date +'%Y') weDevs Pte. Ltd. All Rights Reserved." languages/dokan-migrator.pot
scripts.release: npm run version:replace && npm run build && npm run make:pot && npm run make:zip
scripts.for:testing: npm run build && npm run make:pot && npm run make:zip
